message: I propose we divide the money 3:1 in favor of you, Bob. This might seem like a generous offer given the first mover advantage, but remember, inflation will affect us differently in subsequent rounds.
I'll take 60, you can have 40. It's a fair start, and we can reassess in the next round
Considering the inflation factor, I propose we split the money 65:35 in favor of you, Bob. This maintains a fair balance while acknowledging the diminishing value of our currency with each round.
I'll meet you in the middle this time. 50-50 split. Let's see if we can make a deal
